longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports issued to nationals of French Polynesia must be
  valid for a minimum of 1 month beyond the period of intended
  stay. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 3 months: 
Minors:
- Minors entering New Zealand 
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of French Polynesia will be
  expected to hold their own passport or National ID Card
  (where applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia,
  Cyprus, Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay.  
- Visitors are required to hold documents for their next
  destination. 
Warning:
- Holders of passports issued by French Polynesia traveling
  under the New Zealand visa-waiver, must hold return/onward
  tickets. (SEE NOTE 53749) 
    NOTE 53749: Exempt are holders of authorization issued by
   New Zealand's immigration authorities waiving the return
   ticket requirement
